content.prompt: In the work shown, the influence of earlier architecture styles can be seen in the

choices.label: oval shape that allows for expansive viewing from all sides
arches that are framed by engaged columns and a lintel
engaged columns that distribute the weight evenly on all sides
oculus that provides natural lighting for the events

topic.text: 2.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
